branchCategory.name: Polyurethane Tubing
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC's series&nbsp;of polyurethane tubing is manufactured from Polyether&nbsp;resin, insuring the longest possible tube life due to its immunity to hydrolysis. Series TIUB inch size tubing is available in 8 "quick ship" colors, in standard stocked lengths of 66ft, 100ft, 500ft, 1000ft and 1640ft.&nbsp;&nbsp;There are&nbsp;21 additional standard colors to suit special needs.&nbsp;</p>

branchItem.name: TIUB
branchItem.description: <P>SMC's series of polyurethane tubing is manufactured from Polyether resin, insuring the longest possible tube life due to its immunity to hydrolysis. Series TIUB inch size tubing is available in 8 "quick ship" colors, in standard stocked lengths of 66ft, 100ft, 500ft, 1000ft and 1640ft.  There are 21 additional standard colors to suit special needs. </P>
